_sText:
_______________________________________
All credit goes to xshadowx for
creating this beautiful map.
Thank you so much.
_______________________________________

I re-uploaded this map, because
it's been down for over 2 years
now. Since some guy made
surf_buzzkill2 (thanks -.-)
the original one became unknown.
I hope that we may celebrate its
revival one day...

Description:

For those who did play surf_buzzkill2 but not the original one:

This map is pretty similar to its second "version" except that it's way smaller. The size is about a quarter of bk2 and the speed boosts are much lower to fit the size. There is no mainrail between the two big ramps, which makes it a little bit harder to get that ridiculous speed like in bk2.

For those who did neither play buzzkill nor buzzkill2:

This map is a kind of surf-fight-yard. It's pretty small but easy to surf. You can obtain an M3, Kevlar + Helmet and a Night Hawk at spawn (black boxes, picture 2). There are several other weapons like a Magnum Sniper Rifle, a Scout, Dual Elites, M4 and much more. If you can't find your weapon of choice, you can buy it from the hidden secret buyzone. There is also a bomb spot if your opponent likes to camp and you don't know where he is.

My recommendations for server admins:

- surf settings (duh...) sv_airaccelerate between 150 and 300
- bhop settings (I don't know how they are since the 2010 update)
- noblock
- NO Deathmatch! No, really, it just doesn't feel right at buzzkill (just like RPG or WCS) ...
